input_text: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ko ekikaran suru gareko thiyo. Uha ko netritwama dherai rajya haru jodera ek sajilo Nepal banayeko ho. Gorkha bata suru gareko yatra le Kathmandu upatyaka lai ni apno adhikar ma liyera Nepal lai ek samriddha desh banayeko kura itihas ma lekhiyeko cha.
summary: Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ko ekikaran suru gare.

input_text: Hijo ko din Nepali cricket team ko lagi ek aitihasik din thiyo. Team le World Cup qualify garna sakyo, jun kaam aghi kasai le garna sakeko thiena. Team ko mehnat ra dedication le desh bhar ma utsaha jagayo. Kathmandu ko rato maidan ma hajaaro manis haru yehi safaltako katha lekhdai thiye.
summary: Nepali cricket team le World Cup qualify gareko aitihasik din thiyo.

input_text: Bishwo ko sabai thulo pariwartan haru ek ek kranti ko rup ma aaye. Jastai, Industrial Revolution le manav jeevan ma ekdamai thulo pariwartan lyayo. Samanya krishi adharit samaj bata yatra suru garera modern industrial samaj banayeko kura yo pariwartan le pramaanit garna sakcha.
summary: Industrial Revolution le bishwo ma thulo pariwartan lyayo.

input_text: Ram ra Sita ko katha Nepali sanskriti ma ek aitihasik ansh ko rup ma cha. Ram le apni patni Sita ko rakshya garna Ravan sang ladeko ra tyo ladain ma jeet hasil garera pramanit gareko ki satya ko hamesha jeet huncha. Yo katha Nepali samaj ma ni dharmik ra naitik sikshya ko rup ma dekhincha.
summary: Ram ra Sita ko katha Nepali sanskriti ko aitihasik ansh ho.

input_text: Pokhara ek prasiddha paryatanik thau ho. Tyaha ko Fewa taal ra machhapuchhre himal ko drishya le duniya bhari ka paryatak haru lai aakarshit garna sakcha. Pokhara bata annai adventure activities jastai trekking, paragliding, ra rafting garna milcha. Pokhara Nepal ko ek tourism capital ho bhanera pani manincha.
summary: Pokhara prasiddha paryatanik thau ho.

input_text: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ho. Yeha sanskritik ra aitihasik mahatto ko dherai thulo prayojan cha. Prithivi bhar ka buddh dharma anusari haru yeha puja r arthaat ko lagi auncha. Lumbini ko Maya Devi Mandir ra Ashoka Stambh le prachin sanskriti ko jhalak dincha.
summary: Lumbini Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ho.

input_text: Nepali sanskriti ma dasain ekdamai mahatwapurna chad ho. Yo chad ma sabai pariwar ekai thau ma jamma hunchan, ani rukh ko ful ra jamara ko puja garera devi durga lai samarpan garchan. Dasain ko tyo tika ko din ma je pani purohit ko asirbad le sansarai sukhmay huncha jasto lagcha.
summary: Dasain Nepali sanskriti ma ek mahatwapurna chad ho.

input_text: Rana kaal ma Nepal ko sthiti dherai kathin thiyo. Rana shashak haru le janta ko adhikar ma dhyan na diye ani uniharule desh ko arthik ra samajik pragati ma badha puryaune kaam gare. Tyahi bela Prachanda Gorkha ko abhiyan le desh lai rana shashan bata mukta garna prayas gareko ho.
summary: Rana kaal ma Nepal ko sthiti dherai kathin thiyo.

input_text: 1950 ko saal ma Nepal ma ek thulo pariwartan suru bhayo. Rastriya Prajatantra Party ko aghuwa harule Rana shashan ko viruddha andolan suru gare. Tyasko parinaam swaroop Nepal ma Prajatantra sthapana bhayo ani loktantra ko margma ek naya yatra ko suruwaat garna sakiyo.
summary: 1950 ma Rana shashan viruddha andolan le Prajatantra sthapana garayo.

input_text: Pahile ko din haru ma Manang ko bato ekdamai jhanjhatilo hunthyo. Tara abako samay ma tyo bato bikashit bhaisakyo. Motor gadi haru chalna sakne ra pahilo jastai garho na huney yojana suru bhayeko kura sthaniya haru le garirakheko cha.
summary: Manang ko bato pahila garho thiyo tara aba bikashit bhaisakyo.

input_text: Pasupatinath mandir Nepali sanskriti ra hindu dharma ko ek mahatwapurna kendra ho. Harek saal yeha Shivaratri ko din lakshau bhaktajan haru aayera Shivaji ko puja garna aakarsit hunchan. Mandir ko prangan ma bhaeko Sundar Bagmati nadi ko paani le pani puja ko mahatwa bardha cha.
summary: Pasupatinath mandir Nepali sanskriti ko mahatwapurna kendra ho.

input_text: Mero hajurbaale malai bhut puran ko dherai katha sunaaunuhunthyo. Uha le sunaaunubhaeka ma ek katha ma ek jan garib kisan le aphno mehnat le dhaniko sahayog liye bina aphno gaun ko sthiti sudhareko thiyo. Tyo katha le malai hamesha mehnat ko mulya sikhayo.
summary: Hajurbaale sunako katha le mehnat ko mahatwa sikhayo.

input_text: Gorkha durbar Nepali itihas ko ek aitihasik thau ho. Yeha bata Prithvi Narayan Shah le Nepal ekikaran ko abhiyan suru garnubhaeko thiyo. Durbar ko bhitra purano kala-kriti ra sthapit devidevta ko murtiharule itihas ko samjhana dincha.
summary: Gorkha durbar Nepal ko ekikaran ko itihasik thau ho.

input_text: Chitwan ko Bharatpur ma ek din ko anubhav ekdamai ramailo thiyo. Sauraha ma baagh ko drishya herna ra Bagmati nadi ma canoeing garna dherai man lagyo. Tyaha ka sthaniya manche haru ko satkar le yo anubhav ajhai samjhanayogya banayo.
summary: Chitwan ko Bharatpur ko anubhav ramailo ra samjhanayogya thiyo.

input_text: 2015 ko bhukampa le Nepal ma dherai thulo naas garayo. Manchhe haru ko ghar barbad bhae ra dherai le aphna najik ka manche haru lai gumayeko thiyo. Tara Nepali manchhe haru le milera puji kathin samay ko samana gare ani desh punarnirman ko yatra suru garna sakyo.
summary: 2015 ko bhukampa le thulo naas garayo tara Nepali harule punarnirman suru gare.

input_text: Mt. Everest, jun Nepali bhasha ma Sagarmatha bhanincha, sansar ko sabai uchai ma bhaeko himal ho. Pratyek saal yo himal chadhna duniya bhar bata paryatak haru aauchhan. Yo ek taraf adventure ko kendra ho ra arko taraf Nepali sanskriti ra gaurav ko pratik pani ho.
summary: Mt. Everest sansar ko sabai uchai himal ho ra Nepali gaurav ko pratik ho.

input_text: Lalitpur ko Patan Durbar Square Nepali kala ra sanskriti ko ek adbhut drishya dincha. Tyaha ka purano mandir haru, bhaitika ghar haru, ra chautara haru le prachin Nepali sthapatya ko katha sunaucha. Pratyek tourist lai yo thau anibarya hernuparcha bhanne laagcha.
summary: Patan Durbar Square Nepali kala ra sanskriti ko adbhut drishya ho.

input_text: Sagarmatha National Park UNESCO World Heritage Site ho. Yeha dherai prakriti ko sundarta cha ra wildlife pani dherai cha. Snow leopard, red panda jasta janawar haru yeha dekhna sakincha. Yeha ko himal ra jungle le Nepali paryatan ma ek damai mahatwapurna bhumika khelcha.
summary: Sagarmatha National Park UNESCO World Heritage Site ho.

input_text: Sita ko janmabhumi Janakpur ma Ramayan ko aitihasik katha haru ko jhalak dekhna milcha. Janaki Mandir ekdamai sundar cha ra dherai bhaktajan haru puja garna tyaha jaancha. Tyaha ko Makar Mela ra Bibaha Panchami jasto utsav haru le Janakpur ko aitihasik mahatwa ajhai badiyo.
summary: Janakpur Sita ko janmabhumi ho ra aitihasik mandir haru cha.

input_text: Dhaulagiri Himal, jo sansar ko saatau uchai ma cha, trekking ko lagi prasiddha cha. Yeha ko paryatanik marg dherai challenging huncha, tara manorma drishya le dherai adventure premi haru lai akarsit garcha. Yeha ka gaun haru ko sthaniya sanskriti pani anubhav garna milcha.
summary: Dhaulagiri trekking ko lagi challenging ra ramailo thau ho.

input_text: Nepali raithane khel haru ma Dandi Biyo ko naam sabailai thaha cha. Yo khel samanya huda pani dherai majja le khelincha. Aajabholi modern khel haru ko prabhav le yo khel ma kammijro cha, tara purano samay ma dherai manchhe ko priya khel thiyo.
summary: Dandi Biyo ek raithane Nepali khel ho.

input_text: Siddhartha Gautam le keval 29 barsa ko umar ma rajya chhadera sanyas ko marg apnaye. Unle bodhi briksh muniko dhyan le moksha prapti gare ani buddha bane. Unka upadesh haru le purba asia ko dherai deshma dharmik ra samajik pariwartan lyayo.
summary: Siddhartha Gautam le dhyan dwara moksha prapti garera buddha bane.

input_text: Langtang National Park Nepal ko ek ramro paryatanik kshetra ho. Tyaha ko chiso hawapani, unnat ghasghas haru, ra yak ko basti le ek anokha anubhav dincha. Langtang trekking ka lagi matrai hoina, shanti ani sundarta khojne haru ko lagi pani mahatwapurna thau ho.
summary: Langtang National Park ek ramro paryatanik kshetra ho.

input_text: Rara taal, jun Nepal ko sabai thulo taal ho, ekdam sundar ani prasiddha paryatanik thau ho. Tyaha ko nilo paani ra paripurna drishya le pratyek manchhe ko man tancha. Dherai manchhe yeha aayera camping ani boating ko majja lanchan.
summary: Rara taal Nepal ko sabai thulo ra sundar taal ho.

input_text: Tribhuvan Rajpath, jun Kathmandu ra Birgunj lai jodcha, Nepal ko ek purano highway ho. Yeha ko sankin bato ra tirko dherai challenging huncha, tara dherai manchhe le aajabholi ni yo bato prayog garchan. Itihas ma yo bato le dherai thulo mahatwa rakhdai aayo.
summary: Tribhuvan Rajpath Kathmandu ra Birgunj ko purano highway ho.

input_text: Mero gaun ko purano mandir ekdamai prasiddha ho. Tyaha ko devi ko murti le dherai bhaktalai aasirbad diye jasto lagcha. Prati barsa ek thulo mela hune ani sabai gaunle haru ekai thau ma jamma hune mahatwapurna samaya ho.
summary: Gaun ko purano mandir prasiddha ra mahatwapurna ho.

input_text: Araniko Highway Nepal ra China bich ko mahatwapurna sadak ho. Yeha ko bato le Sindhupalchok ko Sundarijal dekhi tatopani samma jodne kaam garcha. Yo bato le Nepali bazaar lai pratyaksh China ko bazaar sang jodne kaam garna sakcha.
summary: Araniko Highway Nepal ra China ko jodne sadak ho.

input_text: Pokhara ma herne jasta thau haru ko abhav chhaina. Devi ko jharna, Bindyabasini Mandir, ra Fewa taal ko manorama drishya le manchhe haru lai jhaskhyaunchan. Annapurna range ko ekdamai ramro drishya pokhara bata herna sakinchha.
summary: Pokhara ma dherai sundar paryatanik thau haru cha.

input_text: Shuklaphanta Wildlife Reserve Nepali jungle safari ko lagi prasiddha thau ho. Yeha dherai wildlife species haru dekhna sakincha jastai Bengal tiger, deer, ra dherai pakshi haru. Jungle ra swamp ko sundarta le yo thau adventure lover haru ko lagi swarga jasto cha.
summary: Shuklaphanta Wildlife Reserve jungle safari ko prasiddha thau ho.

input_text: Nepali maunbar ko sanskriti ek sundar anushasan ko rup ma dekhincha. Maunbar le manche lai aphno man shanta garna ra nirantar sadhana ma lagna sadhyo. Dherai dharmik thau ma maunbar palan garera shanti ko anubhav garna manchhe aauchha.
summary: Nepali maunbar ek sundar anushasan ko sanskriti ho.

input_text: Solukhumbu Nepal ko ekdamai ramro thau ho jun Everest base camp ko gateway pani ho. Yeha ka sherpa haru ko mithas ani hospitality le manchhe haru ko anubhav ajhai ramailo banaucha. Everest ko himal lai nazik bata herne sapana yeha pura huncha.
summary: Solukhumbu Everest base camp ko gateway ho ra sherpa ko hospitality prasiddha cha.

input_text: Nepal ko Lhosar parva dherai mahatwapurna cha, bises garera Tamang, Gurung, ra Sherpa samuday ka lagi. Yo parva ma naye barsa ko shubha kamana ko rup ma manaiincha. Sanga sanga nach, geet, ra mitho khana le yo parva ajhai ramailo bancha.
summary: Lhosar naye barsa ko parva ho bises gari Tamang, Gurung, ra Sherpa ka lagi.

input_text: B.P. Koirala Nepali rajnitiko ekdamai prabhavit byakti thiyo. Uha le Nepali Congress party ko sthapana garera Nepal ma Prajatantra ko marg prastut garnubhaeko thiyo. Uha ko lekh ra soch haru le Nepali samaj ma aja samma prabhav pariraheko cha.
summary: B.P. Koirala Nepali rajnitiko prabhavit byakti ra Prajatantra ko aguwako rup ma chinchiyincha.

input_text: Rani Pokhari Kathmandu ko ekdamai aitihasik ra ramailo thau ho. King Pratap Malla le yo pokhari aphno swargiya patni ko samjhanama banayeko ho. Pokhari ma puja garna harik saal haribodhini ekadashi ko din manchhe haru jamma hunchan.
summary: Rani Pokhari Kathmandu ko aitihasik ra dharmik thau ho.

input_text: Chitwan National Park Nepal ko pratham National Park ho. Yo UNESCO World Heritage Site pani ho. Park ma rhino, tiger, gharial jasta dherai anokha wildlife haru paaincha. Jungle safari ra canoeing le paryatak haru ko anubhav ajhai ramailo banaucha.
summary: Chitwan National Park Nepal ko pratham National Park ho ra wildlife ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Lalitpur ma bhaeko Krishna Mandir ek aitihasik ra kala ko adbhut udaharan ho. Mandir ko pura sanrachana stone ko banecha ra carving haru dherai manorma cha. Bhagwan Krishna ko janmastami ka bela tyaha dherai bhaktajan haru jamma hunchan.
summary: Krishna Mandir Lalitpur ma stone ko aitihasik ra kala ko mandir ho.

input_text: Dhaulagiri trekking Nepal ma ek thulo adventure trekking route ho. Yo himal sansar ko saatau uchai himal ho ra trek ka lagi dherai challenging tara ramailo huncha. Dhaulagiri round trek ma local culture ko anubhav ra pristine himal ko drishya herna milcha.
summary: Dhaulagiri trekking challenging ra himal ko ramailo drishya dine route ho.

input_text: Lumbini ko Maya Devi Mandir Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ma sthit cha. UNESCO World Heritage Site ma pareko yo mandir le sanskritik ra dharmik mahatwa dincha. Buddha ka upadesh ko shanti ra karuna le yo thau lai bises banaucha.
summary: Maya Devi Mandir Gautam Buddha ko janmabhumi ma cha ra dharmik mahatwa cha.

input_text: Nepal ko Bhanu Bhakta Acharya le Ramayan ko Nepali anubad gareko ho. Uha Nepali sahitya ko ek thulo lekhak ra kabiko rup ma chinchiyincha. Bhanu Bhakta ko kabita haru le dherai manchhe ko jeevan ma prabhav parcha.
summary: Bhanu Bhakta Acharya le Nepali Ramayan lekhnu bhayo ra sahitya ko prakhyat kavi hun.

input_text: Kathmandu ma bhaeko Swoyambhunath Stupa, jun Monkey Temple pani bhanincha, ek aitihasik ra dharmik thau ho. Tyaha dekhi Kathmandu Valley ko sundarta herna milcha. Buddhist haru ka lagi Swoyambhunath ekdamai mahatwapurna mandir ho.
summary: Swoyambhunath Stupa ek aitihasik ra dharmik thau ho.

input_text: Barun Valley Nepal ma Arun River ko najik ekdamai ramro thau ho. Yeha dherai anokha wildlife ra plants paaincha. Trekking garne haru ko lagi yo thau ek anokha anubhav ho, ra pristine nature ko sundarta samet dekhna milcha.
summary: Barun Valley trekking ka lagi anokha ra sundar thau ho.

input_text: Manang Nepal ko ekdamai ramailo gaun ho. Trekkers haru ko lagi Annapurna Circuit trekking ma parne yo gaun ko sherpa culture ani local khana le dherai naam kamaeko cha. Yeha ko pisang peak ani Tilicho Lake trekking ka lagi prasiddha cha.
summary: Manang trekkers ka lagi Annapurna Circuit trekking ma prasiddha thau ho.

input_text: Sundarijal Kathmandu ko najik parne ek ramailo hiking spot ho. Yeha ko waterfall ani hiking trail dherai manorama huncha. Bagmati River ko suruwaat pani yeha dekhi huncha, jasle Sundarijal lai pani ko mahatwapurna thau banaucha.
summary: Sundarijal Kathmandu najik ko ramailo hiking spot ho.

input_text: Makalu Base Camp trekking ek challenging trekking ho. Yeha ko pristine landscape, high-altitude peaks, ra sherpa villages haru le adventure khojne haru ko lagi adbhut anubhav dincha. Makalu Himal trekking ka lagi ek thulo ghad ho.
summary: Makalu Base Camp trekking challenging ra adventure ka lagi prasiddha ho.

input_text: Nepal ma bhukampa suraksha ma abhitak dherai sudhar garnu parcha. 2015 ko bhukampa le dherai ghar barbad garyo ani punarnirman ka kaam ajhai chaliraheko cha. Sthaniya manche haru le milera aba community center haru banai rahanu bhayeko cha.
summary: 2015 ko bhukampa le ghar barbad garyo ani punarnirman ajhai chaliraheko cha.

input_text: Sindhuligadhi Nepal ko itihas ma ek mahatwapurna thau ho. 1767 ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le yo thau ma Anglo-Nepal yuddha ma British sena lai parajit garnubhaeko thiyo. Yeha ko gorilla yuddha ko kala le Nepal ko swadhinta ko suraksha gariyo. Aajabholi pani yo thau paryatak haru ka lagi itihasik thau ko rup ma bikasit bhairaheko cha.
summary: Sindhuligadhi ma 1767 ma Prithvi Narayan Shah le British lai parajit garnubhaeko thiyo.

input_text: Pashupatinath ko Mahashivaratri ekdamai dharmik utsav ho, jun harik saal bhaktajan haru le manaiincha. Shivaji ko puja garna laakho manchhe Nepal ra bharat bata aai jamma hunchan. Tyaha ko mela, bhasm puja, ra aghori baba haru ko darshan yo utsav ko bises taatparya ho.
summary: Mahashivaratri ma Pashupatinath ma laakho bhaktajan jamma hunchan.

input_text: Gosaikunda taal ek dharmik ra aitihasik thau ho, jun Langtang trekking route ma pareko cha. Hindu dharma anusar yo taal Shiva ko trisul le banayeko ho bhanincha. Prati barsa Janai Purnima ko din dherai bhaktajan haru yeha puja garna aauchhan.
summary: Gosaikunda taal Shiva ko trisul le banayeko dharmik thau ho.

input_text: Mero hajurbaale ek samay ma desh ko durgam thau ma kaam garna janchu bhanera manchhe haru ko seva garnubhaeko thiyo. Uha le school kholera dherai garib balbalika lai siksha dinu bhayo. Aja pani uha ko kaam haru ko katha gaunle haru le samjhana garchan.
summary: Hajurbaale durgam thau ma school kholera garib balbalika lai siksha dinubhaeko thiyo.

input_text: Bhaktapur ko Biska Jatra ek aitihasik ra sanskritik parva ho. Prati barsa yo parva ko samay ma rath yatra garincha. Taumadhi Tole ma Nyatapola Mandir ko samip ma dherai manchhe haru jamma bhai yo utsav manauchan.
summary: Bhaktapur ko Biska Jatra aitihasik ra rath yatra ko parva ho.

input_text: Dhulikhel Kathmandu ko najik parne ek sundar thau ho. Tyaha dekhi Annapurna, Langtang, ra Everest himal ko drishya spaṣṭa dekhna sakincha. Hiking ra sunrise viewpoint ka lagi Dhulikhel dherai prasiddha cha.
summary: Dhulikhel Annapurna, Langtang, ra Everest ko drishya herne ramro thau ho.

input_text: Palpa ko Tansen ek historical ani cultural thau ho. Yeha ko Rani Mahal ra Tansen Durbar dherai aitihasik mahatwa ko cha. Tansen ma Nepali dhaka ko topi ani kapada prasiddha cha, ra sthaniya sanskriti le paryatak haru ko man tancha.
summary: Tansen, Palpa ek historical thau ho ra dhaka topi ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Sagarmatha Base Camp trekking Nepali Himal trekking ko ekdamai prasiddha route ho. Dherai paryatak haru yo himal ko chuchuro nazik bata herna ani sherpa sanskriti ko anubhav garna aauchhan. Trek ma Namche Bazaar, Tengboche Monastery jasta thau dherai ramailo huncha.
summary: Sagarmatha Base Camp trekking himal ra sherpa sanskriti herne prasiddha route ho.

input_text: Chauri gai ra chhurpi Nepali parbat ma basne manchhe haru ko khas sanskritik pehchaan ho. Chauri ko milk bata cheese ra chhurpi banaiincha, jun dherai swadist ra sustho khana ho. Parbat ka gaun haru ma aba pani yo ek aam jivan ko hissa ho.
summary: Chauri ko milk bata chhurpi ra cheese banaiincha, jun parbat ka khas pehchaan ho.

input_text: Swayambhu ma Monkey Temple ko thau yeha basne bandar haru ko karan prasiddha cha. Yeha bata Kathmandu ko sundarta dekhna milcha. Tyaha ko Buddhist stupa le dharmik shanti ani karuna ko sandesh dincha.
summary: Swayambhu ko Monkey Temple Kathmandu ko sundar drishya ra shanti ko thau ho.

input_text: Pokhara ma Seti River ek anokha nadiko rup ma chincha. Yo nadiko gehrayi dherai adbhut cha ra dherai jaso bhag chhapa bhaneko huncha. Seti River rafting ko lagi pani ekdamai ramailo thau ho.
summary: Seti River gehrayi ra rafting ka lagi prasiddha nadiko rup ma chincha.

input_text: Thamel Kathmandu ko ek vividh sanskritik thau ho, jun tourist haru ko lagi swarga jasto huncha. Yeha ko local market, restaurant, ani live music haru dherai ramailo huncha. Nightlife ko lagi Thamel Kathmandu ko sabai popular thau ho.
summary: Thamel tourist ra nightlife ko lagi Kathmandu ko prasiddha thau ho.

input_text: Ilam Nepal ko prashiddha chiyabari ko thau ho. Tyaha ko hariyo chaiaabari haru ko drishya dherai manorama huncha. Local chiyako swad ko majja lina ra sustainable farming dekhna ko lagi Ilam jana parcha.
summary: Ilam chiyabari ra local chiyako lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Muktinath Mandir Nepali Hindu ani Buddhist haru ka lagi dharmik thau ho. Annapurna Himal ko kakhma basne yo mandir ma mukti ko anubhav garna dherai manchhe aauchha. Tyaha ko 108 dhara ko paani le snan garera dharmik shuddhi garna milcha.
summary: Muktinath Mandir Hindu ra Buddhist dharmik thau ho.

input_text: Ek din Ram ra Sita jungle ma ghumnu gaye. Jungle ma dherai sundar phool ra chara haru thie. Tara, ek patak Ram harayeka the ra Sita le uniharuko khoji garna thaln. Dherai ghanta samma khoji pachi Sita le Ram lai ek tallo nadi ko kinara ma bhettin. Ram le bataun bhayo ki u afno bato bigri nadi samma pugnu bhayeko thiyo. Dui jana le ek arka lai angalera ghar tirai farke.
summary: Ram ra Sita jungle ghumna gaye, ra Ram harayepachi Sita le nadi ko kinara ma khoji gari bhetnu bhayo.

input_text: Ravi ek din thulo exam ko tayari garirathe. Uka sathi Hari le madhyaharsha ma bolaera khelnu jane ni bhanthyo. Tara Ravi le dherai mehnat garera afno exam ko tayari gariyo. Tes din Ravi ko exam dherai ramro bhayo ra u pass pani bhaecha. Aba Hari le bujha cha ki samay ma ramro kura garna siknu parchha.
summary: Ravi le exam ko tayari ma mehnat garera pass gariyo ra Hari le samaya ko mulya bujha.

input_text: Sangita ek din afno padhai chodera bhaagnu parcha bhanera sochin. Uko ghar ma dherai garibi thiyo, ra uslai afno sapana pura garna muskil lagcha. Tara, ek samay ma ek sikshak le usko katha sunera uslai sahayog gare. Aba Sangita afno sapana pura garna school ma ta padhnai cha, tara shikshak ko madhat le uslai bhaabisya ma safal banauxa bhanera usle vishwas cha.
summary: Sangita garibi le thakepachi ek sikshak ko sahayog le sapana pura garna agadi badhin.

input_text: Ramesh ra Suresh dui dherai milne saathi haru thiye. Ek din uniharule ek bike liera ramailo ghumnu jane bhanera sochin. Tara bato ma tyesto ek samasya aayo ki Ramesh ko bike le kaam garnu chhodiyo. Tyahapachi Suresh le Ramesh ko bike khane ma maadhat garera tyaha naya jeevan diye. Aba dui jana le milera yo katha samjhi ramailo gare.
summary: Ramesh ra Suresh le milera bike ko samasya samadhaan gari ramailo yatra gare.

input_text: Meera le ek thulo sapana dekhi, usle ek din afno ramro painting banai world famous huncha bhanthiyo. Tara sabai kura dherai gahiro hunthiyo, usko ghar pariwarko support kam hunthiyo. Aba ek thulo art competition ma Meera le afno sabai artwork le present garna sahash gariyo. Tyo artwork le uslai first prize dina samarth bhayo ra aba usko sapana pura huncha bhanera bishwas cha.
summary: Meera le art competition jitera afno painting le world famous huncha bhanera bishwas rakhin.

input_text: Hari ek garib kishan ko chhoro thiyo. Usko baba le din ra raat kam garera usko padhai ko lagi paisa jutai raheko thiyo. Tara ek din Hari le afno class ma sabai lai surprise diyera first position lina sakyo. Aba Hari le afno baba le jastai mehnat gare afno pariwarko jeevan sudharne sapana rakhyo.
summary: Hari garib baba ko sahayog le padhai ma mehnat garera first position lina sakyo.

input_text: Rohan ek din jungle tira ghumna gayo. Tyaha usle ek anokha kukhura jasto chara bhettyo, jasle dherai ramro rang le bharera sundar dekhiyo. Rohan le tyo chara ko tasbir khichera sabai saathiharulai dekhayo. Aba sabai jana le tyo jungle ma tyasto sundar chara dekhna janchan.
summary: Rohan le jungle ma sundar anokha chara bhetera tasbir khichyo.

input_text: Sunita le ek din afno gaun ma ek chhoto pustakalaya kholna man parcha bhanera sochin. Gaun ka manche haru le padne habit banau bhanera usle bistarai bistarai kitaab jutai. Aba usko pustakalaya ma dherai manche haru padna aauncha ra aba bachha haru ko shiksha ramro hune bhayo.
summary: Sunita le gaun ma pustakalaya kholera shiksha sudharna madat gari.

input_text: Ek din Krishna ra Milan le nadi tira machha pakadna jane bhanera plan gare. Tara nadi ko paani dherai chiso ra taaja hunthiyo. Aba Krishna le ek machha pakadyo tara Milan le kehi pakadna sakeko thiyena. Tara last ma Krishna le Milan ko lagi ek machha bhandai tarfa diyera dui jana ma milan ramailo bhayo.
summary: Krishna le Milan ko lagi ek machha diyera dherai ramailo banayo.

input_text: Ek thulo gaun ma ek budha manche thiyo, jasle sabai jivan ma manchhe haru ko madat matra gare. Tara, aba u thulo umrako hunthiyo ani gaun le usko sanskriti lai smaran garna ek badiyo sammelan banayo. Aba budha manche ko katha sundai dherai manche haru le inspiration lina thale.
summary: Budha manche le madat garna thulo umrama jivan smaran paayo ra manche inspire bhae.

input_text: Pokhara ek sundar thau ho, jaha Fewa taal ko aakarshan dherai cha. Yeha Himal ko drishya, boating, ani paragliding prasiddha cha. Pokhara ko Ratna Mandir ra Tal Barahi Mandir ko punja dherai tourist lai man parcha.
summary: Pokhara Himal, Fewa taal, ra paragliding ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Nepal ma Dashain sabai thulo parva ho. Isma manche haru tika, jamara lagayera ashirbad linca. Yo parva haru sanga milera manaiincha, ani khas garera kukhura ra khasi ko masu khas chhaina.
summary: Dashain Nepal ko sabai thulo parva ho.

input_text: Everest Himal duniya ko sabai thulo himal ho. Dherai paryatak haru yo chuchuro chadna aauncha. Lukla bata trekking suru garera Everest Base Camp samai jaada ek mahina lagcha.
summary: Everest duniya ko thulo himal ho.

input_text: Swayambhunath Stupa Kathmandu ma ek purano buddhist stupa ho. Bandar haru ko karan 'Monkey Temple' bhanera chincha. Tyaha bata sundar Kathmandu upatyaka ko drishya dekhna milcha.
summary: Swayambhunath Kathmandu ma Monkey Temple ho.

input_text: Dhurmus-Suntali Foundation le Nepal ma ek model gaun banayeko cha. Gorkha earthquake pachi ghar haraeka manche harulai madat garna, yo project suru gareko ho. Aba tyo gaun dherai ramro ra adunik cha.
summary: Dhurmus-Suntali le earthquake pachi model gaun banaye.

input_text: Lumbini Buddha ko janma sthal ho. Yeha Ashoka Stambha, Maya Devi Mandir, ra dherai monasteries cha. Lumbini UNESCO World Heritage Site ho ra shanti ko sandesh dincha.
summary: Lumbini Buddha ko janma sthal ho.

input_text: Thamel Kathmandu ma ek popular tourist spot ho. Yeha ko restaurant, bar, ani local shop haru dherai ramailo huncha. Nightlife ko lagi pani Thamel dherai prasiddha cha.
summary: Thamel Kathmandu ma tourist ra nightlife ko spot ho.

input_text: Nepal ko cricket team le antarashtriya star ma naam kamauna thaleko cha. Paras Khadka jasto kheladi haru le cricket ko bikash garna thulo yogdan diye. Aba Nepal le ODI status pani paaisakyo.
summary: Nepal cricket team le ODI status paayo.

input_text: Sagarmatha National Park Nepal ko UNESCO World Heritage Site ho. Yeha dherai wildlife, plants, ani Everest ko drishya cha. Trekking ani mountaineering ko lagi yo area dherai ramailo cha.
summary: Sagarmatha National Park Everest ani wildlife ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Ilam Nepal ko chiyabari ko lagi dherai prasiddha ho. Hariyo chaiaabari haru ko drishya dherai manorama cha, ra local organic chiyako swad le sabailai man parcha.
summary: Ilam chiyabari ra organic chiyako lagi prasiddha ho.

input_text: Janakpur Ramayan ma Mahadev ra Sita ko prem ko kahani ko sthal ho. Yeha Janaki Mandir Nepal ko ek damai sundar mandir ho. Janakpur ma Ram-Sita ko bibaha ko utsav manaiincha.
summary: Janakpur Sita ra Ram ko prem ko thau ho.

input_text: Nagarkot Kathmandu bata ekdamai najik parcha. Yeha bata sunrise ra sunset ko himal drishya dherai ramailo cha. Yeha hiking ra photography ko lagi manchhe haru dherai jamma hunchan.
summary: Nagarkot ma sunrise ra himal ko drishya ramailo cha.

input_text: Chitwan National Park Nepal ko ekdamai mahatwapurna protected area ho. Rhino, tiger, ra gharial dekhna milcha. Jungle safari ra canoe ride ko lagi dherai tourist yeha aaunchan.
summary: Chitwan ma jungle safari ra wildlife dekhna milcha.

input_text: Rara taal Nepal ko sabai thulo fresh water taal ho. Yeha ko sundarta le tourist haru ko man tancha. Rara National Park ko wildlife herna pani dherai ramailo huncha.
summary: Rara taal Nepal ko sabai thulo fresh water taal ho.

input_text: Kathmandu Durbar Square ek purano itihasik thau ho. Yeha ko Hanuman Dhoka Palace ra Kasthamandap dherai prasiddha cha. Aba UNESCO World Heritage Site pani ho.
summary: Kathmandu Durbar Square itihasik ra prasiddha thau ho.

input_text: Machhapuchhre Himal Pokhara ko ek damai ramro himal ho. Isko shikhar le machha ko puchhar jasto dekhcha, ra yo Himal climbing ko lagi restricted cha. Yeha bata sunset ra sunrise ko drishya dherai ramailo cha.
summary: Machhapuchhre Himal machha ko puchhar jasto dekhcha.

input_text: Pashupatinath Mandir Kathmandu ma Bagmati nadi ko kinara ma cha. Yo Nepal ko ek sabai mahatwapurna Hindu mandir ho, jaha Shivaji ko aradhana huncha. Maha Shivaratri ma hazaarau bhakta haru mandir ma jamma hunchan.
summary: Pashupatinath Shivaji ko prasiddha mandir ho.

input_text: Rara taal Nepal ko western region ma cha, jun sundar harit le gheriyeko cha. Taal ko nilo paani ra chhuwari ka jungle dherai manoram huncha. Tourist haru camping ra photography ko lagi yeha aaunchan.
summary: Rara taal sundar nilo paani ra jungle le gheriyeko cha.

input_text: Patihani Chitwan National Park ko ek pradesh ho jaha sunset ko drishya dherai prasiddha cha. Yeha Bagmati nadi ko kinara baata dherai wildlife herna milcha. Dherai tourist le boat ride ko anand pani linchan.
summary: Patihani ma sunset ra wildlife prasiddha cha.

input_text: Kalinchowk Bhagwati Mandir ek thulo mandir ho, jun Dolakha ma cha. Yeha baata snow-covered himal ra surrounding hills ko drishya dherai ramailo cha. Tourist haru hiking ko lagi pani aaunchan.
summary: Kalinchowk ma snow-covered himal ra mandir dherai ramailo cha.

input_text: Chandragiri Hills Kathmandu ko najik cha, jaha cable car ride ko anubhav dherai ramailo cha. Hilltop baata Kathmandu Valley ra himal ko drishya ekdamai manoram huncha.
summary: Chandragiri ma cable car ra valley ko drishya ramailo cha.

input_text: Tilicho taal duniya ko sabai uchai ma hune fresh water taal ho. Annapurna Himal chain ko najik cha ra trekking ko rasta dherai challenging huncha. Taal ko paani nadi jastai nilo dekhcha.
summary: Tilicho taal sabai uchai ma hune fresh water taal ho.

input_text: Boudhanath Stupa Kathmandu ko ek damai thulo Buddhist Stupa ho. Yo round shape ma cha, ani chara haru le ghumnu ta ramailo, sabai bhaktale tyaha dharmik shanti ko anubhav lanchan.
summary: Boudhanath Kathmandu ko thulo Buddhist Stupa ho.

input_text: Langtang National Park Nepal ko ek sundar protected area ho. Yeha snow leopard, red panda, ra dherai wildlife herna milcha. Trekking route yeha baata Ramche Peak samma popular cha.
summary: Langtang ma trekking ra wildlife prasiddha cha.

input_text: Tansen Palpa ma ek purano shahari thau ho, jun Rana kaal ko darbar ani ancient architecture ko lagi prasiddha cha. Tyaha ko dhaka topi ani local handicrafts dherai ramailo huncha.
summary: Tansen Rana kaal ko darbar ra handicraft ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Bandipur ek chhoto pahad ma basaeko gaun ho, jaha purano Newari ghar haru preserved cha. Yeha baata himal ko sundar drishya ani cultural experience ko anubhav lanchan.
summary: Bandipur ma Newari ghar ra himal ko drishya ramailo cha.

input_text: Changu Narayan Mandir Kathmandu upatyaka ko ek sabai purano mandir ho. Yeha ko prachin architecture, stone carvings, ani history dherai mahatwapurna cha.
summary: Changu Narayan Kathmandu ko purano mandir ho.

input_text: Pokhara ko Sarangkot viewpoint sunrise ra paragliding ko lagi prasiddha cha. Yeha baata Annapurna range ra machhapuchhre Himal ko sundarta herna milcha.
summary: Sarangkot sunrise ra paragliding ko lagi prasiddha cha.

input_text: Sundarijal Kathmandu ko najik ma cha, jaha pani ko jharna haru dherai ramailo cha. Yeha hiking ra picnic spot ko lagi dherai manchhe jamma hunchan.
summary: Sundarijal ma jharna, hiking ra picnic spot cha.
